mem0Url.label: Mem0 Server URL
mem0Url.help: URL of your local Mem0 REST server

userId.label: User ID
userId.help: Memory namespace for this agent. Default: openclaw_{hostname}.

sharedUserId.label: Shared User ID
sharedUserId.help: Shared memory namespace readable by all agents. Defaults to userId.

inheritSharedMemory.label: Inherit Shared Memory
inheritSharedMemory.help: When true, recall also queries the shared namespace and merges results

autoRecall.label: Auto-Recall
autoRecall.help: Inject relevant memories + user profile before every AI turn

autoCapture.label: Auto-Capture
autoCapture.help: Automatically store important information from conversations

maxRecallResults.label: Max Recall Results
maxRecallResults.help: Maximum memories injected into context per turn

profileFrequency.label: Profile Injection Frequency
profileFrequency.help: Inject full profile (static + dynamic) every N turns. Search results are injected every turn.

captureMode.label: Capture Mode
captureMode.help: 'all' (default) = filter out short texts and injected context, 'everything' = capture all messages

debug.label: Debug Logging
debug.help: Enable verbose debug logs for API calls and responses

enableCustomContainerTags.label: Enable Custom Container Tags
enableCustomContainerTags.help: Enable AI-driven routing to custom containers

customContainers.label: Custom Containers
customContainers.help: Define custom containers with tags and descriptions for AI routing

customContainerInstructions.label: Container Instructions
customContainerInstructions.help: Instructions for AI on how to route memories to custom containers
